thread.title: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 semi-final tickets
thread.title_full: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 semi-final tickets - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Rugby World Cup 2015 semi-final tickets
text: More tension, more intensity, higher stakes – enter now to win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets at one of the two semi-final matches at Twickenham. The world has turned oval for Rugby World Cup 2015, and all you have to do to experience the passion and excitement of a semi-final match is look at an illustration of Buckingham Palace and guess how many rugby balls are hidden amidst the rugby madness. Get it right and you’ll be entered into a draw to win tickets. You can enter once a day, and every time you enter you’ll have another chance to win. The more correct entries you make, the higher your odds of winning, so check back regularly. Still feeling lucky? For even more chances to win amazing prizes, keep an eye out for the " 44 Days of Crazy " campaign during the tournament and you could be in for Priceless Surprises. Don’t miss out on your chance to help turn the world oval as the world’s greatest rugby tournament nears its climax. Enter now for your chance to win » In association with: telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
